接口的使用
org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter

  • 使用Converter的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.core.convert.converter
    SPI to implement Converters for the type conversion system.
    org.springframework.core.convert.support
    Default implementation of the type conversion system.
    org.springframework.core.serializer.support
    Support classes for Spring's serializer abstraction.

    • org.springframework.core.convert.converter中Converter的使用

      返回Converter的org.springframework.core.convert.converter中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <T extends R>
      Converter<S,T>      		 ConverterFactory.getConverter(Class<T> targetType)
      Get the converter to convert from S to target type T, where T is also an instance of R.
      参数类型为Converter的org.springframework.core.convert.converter中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Add a plain converter to this registry.
      void ConverterRegistry.addConverter(Converter<?,?> converter)
      Add a plain converter to this registry.

    • org.springframework.core.serializer.support中Converter的使用

      实现Converter的org.springframework.core.serializer.support中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DeserializingConverter
      A Converter that delegates to a Deserializer to convert data in a byte array to an object.
      class  SerializingConverter
      A Converter that delegates to a Serializer to convert an object to a byte array.
